sqlMap.insert: insert into hotel(no, name, price, content, country, region, readcount,main_image, content_image, image3, reg_date, tel, maxnum , checkin , checkout , grade ) values(seq_hotelnum.nextval, #name#, #price#, #content#, #country#, #region#, 0, #main_image#, #content_image#,#image3#, sysdate, #tel#,#maxnum#,#checkin#,#checkout#,#grade#)
